titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for reduced duty treatment for certain fully assembled bicycle wheels.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 11/7/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for reduced duty treatment for bicycle wheel assemblies consisting of rim, carbon-fiber spokes, and hub flange assembled in one piece, or the above plus a rear freewheel-free hub.
